original_title: SLT-Mobitel Enterprise becomes SriLankan Airlines total communication solution provider
original_body_lines: SLT-Mobitel Enterprise, the national ICT solutions provider, dedicated in their service to delivering best-in-class technology for the enterprise segment has signed a bilateral agreement with SriLankan Airlines with the support of Millennium IT ESP. The Managed Services Excellence event was held recently at the Jetwing Blue Hotel in Negombo.

Under this agreement, SLT-Mobitel Enterprise will manage service solutions for SriLankan Airlines including data networking services, enterprise business internet services, and Wi-Fi services including equipment and infrastructure, and voice solutions.

“SLT-Mobitel is proud to partner with SriLankan Airlines in delivering the best possible communication solutions. This partnership builds upon the strong history of collaboration between our two companies and demonstrates our shared commitment to serving Sri Lanka. By leveraging SLT-Mobitel’s enterprise-grade services and solutions and Millennium IT ESP’s expertise, SriLankan Airlines will be able to operate more efficiently and better serve our country and its citizens,” said SLT CEO Janaka R. Abeysinghe.

Commenting on the partnership, SriLankan Airlines Chief Executive Officer Richard Nuttall stated, “We are happy to see our partnership with SLT-Mobitel go from strength to strength. Over the years, SLT-Mobitel has been a reliable and superior provider of enterprise network connectivity services, supporting the multiple communication flows that bring to life the daily operations of the airline. We are certain that SLT-Mobitel will meet and exceed our expectations as we continue to work with them.”

SriLankan Airlines and SLT-Mobitel have enjoyed a mutually beneficial history of working together since the year 2013, when the Airlines became the first Managed Service customer of Sri Lanka Telecom PLC. Building on this relationship, it is expected that this development will open up new avenues of business for both parties in the future. It is noteworthy that SriLankan Airlines is also among the top corporate customers of SLT-Mobitel.

SLT-Mobitel Enterprise offers a range of enterprise-grade services and solutions to support the growing needs of SriLankan Airlines customers. These solutions are backed by the best support and fastest and widest fixed and mobile network, enabling businesses to tap into new opportunities and helping them thrive.
